name: Catastrophic Priest
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: Global changes occur, the game becomes reality, and demonic disasters begin to wreak havoc. To resist all this, everyone must pick a class and level up like crazy. Lin Ye awakens his god-level talent from the beginning, turning things around, and starts speed-running straight from the top dungeon. Priests are weak? If I use the healing technique, you might die! Original Webtoon
